name: Bean Jumper (codebrownie)
description:
Bean Jumper is a simple endless jumper that gradually speeds up as your score increases. It contains all original artwork and music.

Code Brownie is a duo made up of a father who's trying to #learntocode and a grade-school son who loves to draw and create music. This is our first foray into the art of game dev and hope to one day make something good!
